questions.question: What is your advice on how to bring this forward and how to work with the government?
Can you describe what the findings are and why it's in fact so important and impactful?
Any kind of drugs that have a real strong effect, how do you do a double blind study?
If it's great results initially, but then it fades after six months, what's the point?
Like how do we proceed in this in landscape work where drugs can make a lot of money?
And how many species are we going to kill before we figure out not to do that anymore?
